<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:attack_range}}: Determines the [[attack range]] and [[hitbox margin]] of a weapon.
*** {{nbt|float|min_reach}}: The minimum distance in blocks from the attacker to the target to be considered valid. Defaults to 0.0, valid from 0.0 to 64.0.
*** {{nbt|float|max_reach}}: The maximum distance in blocks from the attacker to the target to be considered valid. Defaults to 3.0, valid from 0.0 to 64.0.
*** {{nbt|float|min_creative_reach}}: The minimum distance in blocks from the attacker to the target to be considered valid in [[Creative]] mode. Defaults to 0.0, valid from 0.0 to 64.0.
*** {{nbt|float|max_creative_reach}}: The maximum distance in blocks from the attacker to the target to be considered valid in Creative mode. Defaults to 5.0, valid from 0.0 to 64.0.
*** {{nbt|float|hitbox_margin}}: The margin applied to the target bounding box when checking for valid hitbox collision. Defaults to 0.3, valid from 0.0 to 1.0.
*** {{nbt|float|mob_factor}}: The multiplier applied to {{cd|min_range}} and {{cd|max_range}} when checking for valid distance if item is used by a mob. Defaults to 1.0, valid from 0.0 to 2.0.
</onlyinclude></div>
